title: Impfinity

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, place two extra votes on someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - The first two times any Zombie would die, a Clone dies instead. This Clone's death is not announced to the town. This includes yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Consume the brains of all who oppose the Zombies.

desc:
Post 2585
*Great things come in threes. Three musketeers, three little pigs, three fates...*
